attributes.action: Not allow Mervyn King to become the scape goat
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mervyn King is a solid economist and his decision to not bail out a bank with a risky business strategy I feel was the right one. As public anger grows Mervyn King should not be used as a scape goat to shift the blame off banks who have been engaging in risky practices.

rejection.details: Please give an explicit policy point for HM Government to act upon
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
